actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

legendary_actions.name: Tail
legendary_actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also grappled (escape 24). The grappled target is also restrained. Fraz-Urb'luu can grapple only one creature with his tail at a time.

legendary_actions.name: Phantasmal Killer (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Fraz-Urb'luu casts phantasmal killer, no concentration required.

spells: Fraz-Urb'luu's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 23). Fraz-Urb'luu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), detect magic, dispel magic, phantasmal force

spells.Daily (3e): confusion, dream, mislead, programmed illusion, seeming

spells.Daily (1e): mirage arcane, modify memory, project image

monsters.name: Frost Salamander
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Burning Fury
traits.desc: When the salamander takes fire damage, its Freezing Breath automatically recharges.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The salamander makes five attacks: four with its claws and one with its bite.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage and 5 (1d10) cold damage.

actions.name: Freezing Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The salamander exhales chill wind in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Geryon
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Geryon fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Geryon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Geryon's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Geryon regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Geryon dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Geryon makes two attacks: one with his claws and one with his stinger.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 23 (4d6 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (24) and is restrained until the grapple ends. Geryon can grapple one creature at a time. If the target is already grappled by Geryon, the target takes an extra 27 (6d8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. 14 (2d4 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (2d12) poison damage and become poisoned until it finishes a short or long rest. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the poison damage it takes. If its hit point maximum drops to 0, it dies. This reduction lasts until the poisoned condition is removed.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Geryon magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary_actions.name: Infernal Glare
legendary_actions.desc: Geryon targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. If the target can see Geryon, the target must succeed on a 23 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of Geryon until the end of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Swift Sting (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Geryon attacks with his stinger.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Geryon uses his Teleport action.

spells: Geryon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 21). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), detect magic, geas, ice storm, invisibility (self only), locate object, suggestion, wall of ice

traits.name: Headfirst Charge
traits.desc: The giff can try to knock a creature over; if the giff moves at least 20 feet in a straight line that ends within 5 feet of a Large or smaller creature, that creature must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or take 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

traits.name: Firearms Knowledge
traits.desc: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of muskets and pistols.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giff makes two pistol attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Musket
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Pistol
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fragmentation Grenade (1/Day)
actions.desc: The giff throws a grenade up to 60 feet. Each creature within 20 feet of the grenade's detonation must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Githyanki Gish

traits.name: War Magic
traits.desc: When the githyanki uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The githyanki makes two longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage if used with two hands.

spells: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.Daily (3e): jump, misty step, nondetection (self only)

spells: The githyanki is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The githyanki has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): blade ward, light, message, true strike

spells.1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, magic missile, sleep, thunderwave

monsters.name: Githyanki Kith'rak

traits.name: Rally the Troops
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the githyanki can magically end the charmed and frightened conditions on itself and each creature of its choice that it can see within 30 feet of it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The githyanki makes three greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) psychic damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The githyanki adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the githyanki must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spells: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.Daily (3e): blur, jump, misty step, nondetection (self only)

monsters.name: Githyanki Supreme Commander

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The githyanki makes two greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Silver Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) psychic damage. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the astral projection spell), the githyanki can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The githyanki adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the githyanki must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendary_actions.name: Attack (2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The githyanki makes a greatsword attack.

legendary_actions.name: Command Ally
legendary_actions.desc: The githyanki targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the githyanki, the target can make one melee weapon attack using its reaction and has advantage on the attack roll.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: The githyanki magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it. It also becomes insubstantial until the start of its next turn. While insubstantial, it can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it takes 16 (3d10) force damage and is moved to the nearest unoccupied space.

spells: The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.Daily (3e): jump, levitate (self only), misty step, nondetection (self only)

spells.Daily (1e): Bigby's hand, mass suggestion, plane shift, telekinesis

monsters.name: Githzerai Anarch

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.desc: While the anarch is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The anarch makes three unarmed strikes.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage.

legendary_actions.name: Strike
legendary_actions.desc: The anarch makes one unarmed strike.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: The anarch magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it.

legendary_actions.name: Change Gravity (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The anarch casts the reverse gravity spell. The spell has the normal effect, except that the anarch can orient the area in any direction and creatures and objects fall toward the end of the area.

spells: The anarch's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.Daily (3e): feather fall, jump, see invisibility, shield, telekinesis

spells.Daily (1e): globe of invulnerability, plane shift, teleportation circle, wall of force

monsters.name: Githzerai Enlightened

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.desc: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The githzerai makes three unarmed strikes.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Temporal Strike (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 52 (8d12) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or move 1 round forward in time. A target moved forward in time vanishes for the duration. When the effect ends, the target reappears in the space it left or in an unoccupied space nearest to that space if it's occupied.

spells: The githzerai's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.Daily (3e): blur, expeditious retreat, feather fall, jump, see invisibility, shield

monsters.name: Gloom Weaver

traits.name: Burden of Time
traits.desc: Beasts and humanoids, other than shadar-kai, have disadvantage on saving throws while within 10 feet of the gloom weaver.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The gloom weaver has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gloom weaver makes two spear attacks and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

actions.name: Shadow Spear
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 26 (4d12) necrotic damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 26 (4d12) necrotic damage if used with two hands.

reactions.name: Misty Escape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: When the gloom weaver takes damage, it turns invisible and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the start of its next turn or until it attacks or casts a spell.

spells: The gloom weaver's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: arcane eye, mage armor, speak with dead

spells.Daily (1e): arcane gate, bane, compulsion, confusion, true seeing

spells: The gloom weaver is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): minor illusion, prestidigitation, chill touch, eldritch blast*

spells.5th level (3 slots): armor of Agathys, blight, darkness, dream, invisibility, fear, hypnotic pattern, major image, contact other plane, vampiric touch, witch bolt

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gray render makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, the target must succeed on a 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is prone an additional 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage is dealt to the target.

reactions.name: Bloody Rampage
reactions.desc: When the gray render takes damage, it makes one attack with its claws against a random creature within its reach, other than its master.

monsters.name: Graz'zt
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: Graz'zt can use his action to polymorph into a form that resembles a Medium humanoid, or back into his true form. Aside from his size, his statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Graz'zt fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Graz'zt has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Graz'zt's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Graz'zt attacks twice with Wave of Sorrow.

actions.name: Wave of Sorrow (Greatsword)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (4d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Graz'zt magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Graz'zt attacks once with Wave of Sorrow.

legendary_actions.name: Dance, My Puppet
legendary_actions.desc: One creature charmed by Graz'zt that Graz'zt can see must use its reaction to move up to its speed as Graz'zt directs.

legendary_actions.name: Sow Discord
legendary_actions.desc: Graz'zt casts crown of madness or dissonant whispers.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Graz'zt uses his Teleport action.

spells: Graz'zt's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 23). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: charm person, crown of madness, detect magic, dispel magic, dissonant whispers

spells.Daily (3e): counterspell, darkness, dominate person, sanctuary, telekinesis, teleport

monsters.name: Green Abishai
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai makes two attacks, one with its claws and one with its longsword, or it casts one spell from its Innate Spellcasting trait and makes one claw attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) poison damage and become poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The abishai's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): charm person, detect thoughts, fear

monsters.name: Hellfire Engine
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, unconscious

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The hellfire engine is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The hellfire engine has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Flesh-Crushing Stride
actions.desc:
The hellfire engine moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the hellfire engine enters must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed to the nearest space out of the hellfire engine's path. On a failed save, the creature falls prone and takes 28 (8d6) bludgeoning damage.
If the hellfire engine remains in the prone creature's space, the creature is also restrained until it's no longer in the same space as the hellfire engine. While restrained in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a 18 Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the hellfire engine and is no longer restrained.

actions.name: Hellfire Weapons
actions.desc: The hellfire engine uses one of the following options:

actions.name: Bonemelt Sprayer
actions.desc: The hellfire engine spews acidic flame in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must make a 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) fire damage plus 18 (4d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures that fail the saving throw are drenched in burning acid and take 5 (1d10) fire damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage at the end of their turns. An affected creature or another creature within 5 feet of it can take an action to scrape off the burning fuel.

actions.name: Lightning Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 22 (5d8) lightning damage. Up to three other creatures of the hellfire engine's choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target must each make a 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Thunder Cannon
actions.desc: The hellfire engine targets a point within 120 feet of it that it can see. Each creature within 30 feet of that point must make a 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (2d12) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Howler
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: A howler has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the howler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The howler makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Rending Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is frightened it takes an additional 22 (4d10) psychic damage. This attack ignores damage resistance.

actions.name: Mind-Breaking Howl (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The howler emits a keening howl in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area that isn't deafened must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the howler's next turn. While a creature is frightened in this way, its speed is halved, and it is incapacitated. A target that successfully saves is immune to the Mind-Breaking Howl of all howlers for the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Hutijin
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Infernal Despair
traits.desc: Each creature within 15 feet of Hutijin that isn't a devil makes saving throws with disadvantage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Hutijin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Hutijin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Hutijin's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Hutijin regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Hutijin dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Hutijin makes four attacks: one with his bite, one with his claw, one with his mace, and one with his tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 10 (3d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Hutijin magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

reactions.name: Fearful Voice (Recharge 5-6)
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, Hutijin utters a dreadful word of power. Each creature within 30 feet of him that isn't a devil must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of him for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that saves against this effect is immune to Hutijin's Fearful Voice for 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Hutijin attacks once with his mace.

legendary_actions.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Hutijin releases lightning in a 20-foot radius. All other creatures in that area must each make a 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Hutijin uses his Teleport action.

spells: Hutijin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 22). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), animate dead, detect magic, hold monster, invisibility (self only), lightning bolt, suggestion, wall of fire

monsters.name: Hydroloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The hydroloth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The hydroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The hydroloth's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Secure Memory
traits.desc: The hydroloth is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

traits.name: Watery Advantage
traits.desc: While submerged in liquid, the hydroloth has advantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hydroloth makes two melee attacks. In place of one of these attacks, it can cast one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Steal Memory (1/Day)
actions.desc: The hydroloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target takes 4d6 psychic damage, and it must make a 16 Intelligence saving throw. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to this hydroloth's Steal Memory for 24 hours. On a failed save, the target loses all proficiencies, it can't cast spells, it can't understand language, and if its Intelligence and Charisma scores are higher than 5, they become 5. Each time the target finishes a long rest, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A greater restoration or remove curse spell cast on the target ends this effect early.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The hydroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The hydroloth's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), water walk

spells.Daily (3e): control water, crown of madness, fear, phantasmal killer, suggestion

monsters.name: Iron Cobra
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The iron cobra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or suffer one random poison effect:
1. Poison Damage: The target takes 13 (3d8) poison damage.
2. Confusion: On its next turn, the target must use its action to make one weapon attack against a random creature it can see within 30 feet of it, using whatever weapon it has in hand and moving beforehand if necessary to get in range. If it's holding no weapon, it makes an unarmed strike. If no creature is visible within 30 feet, it takes the Dash action, moving toward the nearest creature.
3. Paralysis: The target is paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Juiblex
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned, unconscious

traits.name: Foul
traits.desc: Any creature, other than an ooze, that starts its turn within 10 feet of Juiblex must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Juiblex fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Juiblex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Juiblex's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Juiblex regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Juiblex dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: Juiblex can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Acid Lash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (4d6 + 7) acid damage. Any creature killed by this attack is drawn into Juiblex's body, and the corpse is obliterated after 1 minute.

actions.name: Eject Slime (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Juiblex spews out a corrosive slime, targeting one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a 21 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 55 (10d10) acid damage. Unless the target avoids taking any of this damage, any metal armor worn by the target takes a permanent −1 penalty to the AC it offers, and any metal weapon it is carrying or wearing takes a permanent −1 penalty to damage rolls. The penalty worsens each time a target is subjected to this effect. If the penalty on an object drops to −5, the object is destroyed.

legendary_actions.name: Acid Splash
legendary_actions.desc: Juiblex casts acid splash.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Juiblex makes one acid lash attack.

legendary_actions.name: Corrupting Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 21 (4d6 + 7) poison damage, and the target is slimed. Until the slime is scraped off with an action, the target is poisoned, and any creature, other than an ooze, is poisoned while within 10 feet of the target.

spells: Juiblex's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). Juiblex can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): blight, contagion, gaseous form

monsters.name: Kruthik Hive Lord
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 12

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The kruthik has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kruthik makes two stab attacks or two spike attacks.

actions.name: Stab
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spike
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The kruthik sprays acid in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Leviathan
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the leviathan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Partial Freeze
traits.desc: If the leviathan takes 50 cold damage or more during a single turn, the leviathan partially freezes; until the end of its next turn, its speeds are reduced to 20 feet, and it makes attack rolls with disadvantage.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The leviathan deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Tidal Wave).

traits.name: Water Form
traits.desc: The leviathan can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The leviathan makes two attacks: one with its slam and one with its tail.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 15 (1d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) acid damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 16 (1d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 6 (1d12) acid damage.

actions.name: Tidal Wave (Recharge 6)
actions.desc:
While submerged, the leviathan magically creates a wall of water centered on itself. The wall is up 250 feet long, up to 250 feet high, and up to 50 feet thick. When the wall appears, all other creatures within its area must each make a 24 Strength saving throw. A creature takes 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage on failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
At the start of each of the leviathan's turns after the wall appears, the wall, along with any other creatures in it, moves 50 feet away from the leviathan. Any Huge or smaller creature inside the wall or whose space the wall enters when it moves must succeed on a 24 Strength saving throw or take 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage. A creature takes this damage no more than once on a turn. At the end of each turn the wall moves, the wall's height is reduced by 50 feet, and the damage creatures take from the wall on subsequent rounds is reduced by 1d10. When the wall reaches 0 feet in height, the effect ends.
A creature caught in the wall can move by swimming. Because of the force of the wave, though, the creature must make a successful 24 Strength (Athletics) check to swim at all during that turn.

legendary_actions.name: Slam (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The leviathan makes one slam attack.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The leviathan moves up to its speed.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The steeder can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Extraordinary Leap
traits.desc: The distance of the steeder's long jumps is tripled; every foot of its walking speed that it spends on the jump allows it to jump 3 feet.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Sticky Leg
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Small or Tiny creature. The target is stuck to the steeder's leg and is grappled until it escapes (escape 12). The steeder can have only one creature grappled at a time.

monsters.name: Marut
monsters.damage_resistances: thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The marut is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the marut fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The marut has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The marut makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Unerring Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack automatic hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 60 force damage, and the target is pushed up to 5 feet away from the marut if it is Huge or smaller.

actions.name: Blazing Edict (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Arcane energy emanates from the marut's chest in a 60-foot cube. Every creature in that area takes 45 radiant damage. Each creature that takes any of this damage must succeed on a 20 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of the marut's next turn.

actions.name: Justify
actions.desc:
The marut targets up to two creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a 20 Charisma saving throw or be teleported to a teleportation circle in the Hall of Concordance in Sigil. A target fails automatically if it is incapacitated. If either target is teleported in this way, the marut teleports with it to the circle.
After teleporting in this way, the marut can't use this action again until it finishes a short or long rest.

spells: The marut's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 20). The marut can innately cast the following spell, requiring no material components.

monsters.name: Maurezhi
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Assume Form
traits.desc: The maurezhi can assume the appearance of any Medium humanoid it has eaten. It remains in this form for 1d6 days, during which time the form gradually decays until, when the effect ends, the form sloughs from the demon's body.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The maurezhi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The maurezhi makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, its Charisma score is reduced by 1d4. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if this reduces its Charisma to 0. It rises 24 hours later as a ghoul, unless it has been revived or its corpse has been destroyed.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Raise Ghoul (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The maurezhi targets one dead ghoul or ghast it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is revived with all its hit points.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the meazel can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Garrote
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target of the meazel's size or smaller. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 13 with disadvantage). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the meazel's turns. The meazel can't make weapon attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Shadow Teleport (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
The meazel, any equipment it is wearing or carrying, and any creature it is grappling teleport to an unoccupied space within 500 feet of it, provided that the starting space and the destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination must be a place the meazel has seen before, but it need not be within line of sight. If the destination space is occupied, the teleportation leads to the nearest unoccupied space.
Any other creature the meazel teleports becomes cursed by shadow for 1 hour. Until this curse ends, every undead and every creature native to the Shadowfell within 300 feet of the cursed creature can sense it, which prevents that creature from hiding from them.

monsters.name: Merregon
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.languages: understands Infernal but can't speak, telepathy 120 ft.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the merregon's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The merregon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The merregon makes two halberd attacks, or if an allied fiend of challenge rating 6 or higher is within 60 feet of it, the merregon makes three halberd attacks.

actions.name: Halberd
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Loyal Bodyguard
reactions.desc: When another fiend within 5 feet of the merregon is hit by an attack, the merregon causes itself to be hit instead.

monsters.name: Merrenoloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The merrenoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The merrenoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Teleport
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the merrenoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The merrenoloth uses Fear Gaze once and makes one oar attack.

actions.name: Oar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fear Gaze
actions.desc: The merrenoloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The merrenoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: charm person, darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, gust of wind

monsters.name: Moloch
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Moloch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Moloch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Moloch's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Moloch regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Moloch dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Moloch makes three attacks: one with his bite, one with his claw, and one with his whip.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 26 (4d8 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Many-Tailed Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 13 (2d4 + 8) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 24 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 30 feet in a straight line toward Moloch.

actions.name: Breath of Despair (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Moloch exhales in a 30-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 21 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage, drop whatever it is holding, and become frightened for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, a creature must take the Dash action and move away from Moloch by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash action. If the creature ends its turn in a location where it doesn't have line of sight to Moloch, the creature can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Moloch magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary_actions.name: Stinking Cloud
legendary_actions.desc: Moloch casts stinking cloud.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Moloch uses his Teleport action.

legendary_actions.name: Whip
legendary_actions.desc: Moloch makes one attack with his whip.

spells: Moloch's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 21). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), animate dead, burning hands (as a 7th-level spell), confusion, detect magic, fly, geas, major image, stinking cloud, suggestion, wall of fire

monsters.name: Molydeus
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the molydeus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The molydeus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The molydeus's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The molydeus makes three attacks: one with its weapon, one with its wolf bite, and one with its snakebite.

actions.name: Demonic Weapon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d10 + 9) slashing damage. If the target has at least one head and the molydeus rolled a 20 on the attack roll, the target is decapitated and dies if it can't survive without that head. A target is immune to this effect if it takes none of the damage, has legendary actions, or is Huge or larger. Such a creature takes an extra 6d8 slashing damage from the hit.

actions.name: Wolf Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d6 + 9) piercing damage.

actions.name: Snakebite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. 12 (1d6 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target transforms into a manes if this reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This transformation can be ended only by a wish spell.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The molydeus makes one attack, either with its demonic weapon or with its snakebite.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The molydeus moves without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell
legendary_actions.desc: The molydeus casts one spell from its Innate Spellcasting trait.

spells: The molydeus's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 22). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Nabassu
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Demonic Shadows
traits.desc: The nabassu darkens the area around its body in a 10-foot radius. Nonmagical light can't illuminate this area of dim light.

traits.name: Devour Soul
traits.desc: A nabassu can eat the soul of a creature it has killed within the last hour, provided that creature is neither a construct nor an undead. The devouring requires the nabassu to be within 5 feet of the corpse for at least 10 minutes, after which it gains a number of Hit Dice (d8s) equal to half the creature's number of Hit Dice. Roll those dice, and increase the nabassu's hit points by the numbers rolled. For every 4 Hit Dice the nabassu gains in this way, its attacks deal an extra 3 (1d6) damage on a hit. The nabassu retains these benefits for 6 days. A creature devoured by a nabassu can be restored to life only by a wish spell.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The nabassu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The nabassu's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The nabassu uses its Soul-Stealing Gaze and makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its bite.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 32 (4d12 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Soul-Stealing Gaze
actions.desc: The nabassu targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the nabassu and isn't a construct or an undead, it must succeed on a 16 Charisma saving throw or reduce its hit point maximum by 13 (2d12) damage and give the nabassu an equal number of temporary hit points. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0, and if the target is a humanoid, it immediately rises as a ghoul under the nabassu's control.

monsters.name: Nagpa
monsters.languages: Common plus up to five other languages

traits.name: Corruption
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the nagpa targets one creature it can see within 90 feet of it. The target must make a 20 Charisma saving throw. An evil creature makes the save with disadvantage. On a failed save, the target is charmed by the nagpa until the start of the nagpa's next turn. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to the nagpa's Corruption for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Paralysis (Recharge 6)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the nagpa forces each creature within 30 feet of it to succeed on a 20 Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A paralyzed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Undead and constructs are immune to this effect.

actions.name: Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The nagpa is a 15th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). A nagpa has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): chill touch, fire bolt, mage hand, message, minor illusion

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, detect magic, protection from evil and good, witch bolt

spells.2nd level (3 slots): hold person, ray of enfeeblement, suggestion

spells.4th level (3 slots): confusion, hallucinatory terrain, wall of fire

monsters.name: Narzugon
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Diabolical Sense
traits.desc: The narzugon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made to perceive good-aligned creatures.

traits.name: Infernal Tack
traits.desc: The narzugon wears spurs that are part of infernal tack, which allow it to summon its nightmare companion.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The narzugon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The narzugon uses its Infernal Command or Terrifying Command. It also makes three hellfire lance attacks.

actions.name: Hellfire Lance
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) fire damage. If this damage kills a creature, the creature's soul rises from the River Styx as a lemure in Avernus in 1d4 hours.
If the creature isn't revived before then, only a wish spell or killing the lemure and casting true resurrection on the creature's original body can restore it to life. Constructs and devils are immune to this effect.

actions.name: Infernal Command
actions.desc: Each ally of the narzugon within 60 feet of it can't be charmed or frightened until the end of the narzugon's next turn.

actions.name: Terrifying Command
actions.desc:
Each creature that isn't a fiend within 60 feet of the narzugon that can hear it must succeed on a 17 Charisma saving throw or become frightened of it for 1 minute.
A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that makes a successful saving throw is immune to this narzugon's Terrifying Command for 24 hours.

actions.name: Healing (1/Day)
actions.desc: The narzugon, or one creature it touches, regains up to 100 hit points.

monsters.name: Nightwalker
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Annihilating Aura
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the nightwalker must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) necrotic damage and grant the nightwalker advantage on attack rolls against it until the start of the creature's next turn. Undead are immune to this aura.

traits.name: Life Eater
traits.desc: A creature reduced to 0 hit points from damage dealt by the nightwalker dies and can't be revived by any means short of a wish spell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The nightwalker uses Enervating Focus twice, or it uses Enervating Focus and Finger of Doom, if available.

actions.name: Enervating Focus
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 28 (5d8 + 6) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

actions.name: Finger of Doom (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The nightwalker points at one creature it can see within 300 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 21 Wisdom saving throw or take 26 (4d12) necrotic damage and become frightened until the end of the nightwalker's next turn. While frightened in this way, the creature is also paralyzed. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the nightwalker's Finger of Doom for the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Nupperibo
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.senses: blindsight 10 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 11

traits.name: Cloud of Vermin
traits.desc: Any creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nupperibo must make a 11 Constitution saving throw. A creature within the areas of two or more nupperibos makes the saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, the creature takes 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Hunger-Driven
traits.desc: In the Nine Hells, the nupperibos can flawlessly track any creature that has taken damage from any nupperibo's Cloud of Vermin within the previous 24 hours.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Oaken Bolter
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The oaken bolter has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The oaken bolter makes two lancing bolt attacks or one lancing bolt attack and one harpoon attack.

actions.name: Lancing Bolt
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 100/400 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Harpoon
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 50/200 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 12). While grappled in this way, a creature's speed isn't reduced, but it can move only in directions that bring it closer to the oaken bolter. A creature takes 5 (1d10) slashing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. As a bonus action, the oaken bolter can pull a creature grappled by it 20 feet closer. The oaken bolter can grapple only one creature at a time.

actions.name: Explosive Bolt (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The oaken bolter launches an explosive charge at a point within 120 feet. Each creature within 20 feet of that point must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Oblex Spawn
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this distance), passive Perception 12

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The oblex can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Aversion to Fire
traits.desc: If the oblex takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) psychic damage.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The ogre deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Bash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the ogre can push the target 5 feet away if the target is Huge or smaller.

actions.name: Block the Path
actions.desc: Until the start of the ogre's next turn, attack rolls against the ogre have disadvantage, it has advantage on the attack roll it makes for an opportunity attack, and that attack deals an extra 16 (3d10) bludgeoning damage on a hit. Also, each enemy that tries to move out of the ogre's reach without teleporting must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of the ogre's next turn.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bolt Launcher
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 17 (3d10 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Chain Sweep
actions.desc: The ogre swings its chain, and every creature within 10 feet of it must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

actions.name: Chain Smash (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure the target is unconscious for 1 minute. The unconscious target repeats the saving throw if it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Howdah
traits.desc: The ogre carries a compact fort on its back. Up to four Small creatures can ride in the fort without squeezing. To make a melee attack against a target within 5 feet of the ogre, they must use spears or weapons with reach. Creatures in the fort have three-quarters cover against attacks and effects from outside it. If the ogre dies, creatures in the fort are placed in unoccupied spaces within 5 feet of the ogre.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Oinoloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 17

traits.name: Bringer of Plagues (Recharge 5-6)
traits.desc:
As a bonus action, the oinoloth blights the area within 30 feet of it. The blight lasts for 24 hours. While blighted, all normal plants in the area wither and die, and the number of hit points restored by a spell to a creature in that area is halved.
Furthermore, when a creature moves into the blighted area or starts its turn there, that creature must make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the oinoloth's Bringer of Plagues for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6) necrotic damage and is poisoned.
The poisoned creature can't regain hit points. After every 24 hours that elapse, the poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's hit point maximum is reduced by 5 (1d10). This reduction lasts until the poison ends, and the target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. The poison ends after the creature successfully saves against it three times.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The oinoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The oinoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The oinoloth uses its Transfixing Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 22 (4d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Corrupted Healing (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The oinoloth touches one willing creature within 5 feet of it. The target regains all its hit points. In addition, the oinoloth can end one disease on the target or remove one of the following conditions from it: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned. The target then gains 1 level of exhaustion, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 7 (2d6). This reduction can be removed only by a wish spell or by casting greater restoration on the target three times within the same hour. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The oinoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Transfixing Gaze
actions.desc: The oinoloth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed until the end of the oinoloth's next turn. While charmed in this way, the target is restrained. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the oinoloth's gaze for the next 24 hours.

spells: The oinoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only)

spells.Daily (1e): feeblemind, globe of invulnerability, wall of fire, wall of ice

monsters.name: Orcus
monsters.damage_immunities: necrotic, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

traits.name: Wand of Orcus
traits.desc:
The wand has 7 charges, and any of its properties that require a saving throw have a save DC of 18. While holding it, Orcus can use an action to cast animate dead, blight, or speak with dead. Alternatively, he can expend 1 or more of the wand's charges to cast one of the following spells from it: circle of death (1 charge), finger of death (1 charge), or power word kill (2 charges). The wand regains 1d4 + 3 charges daily at dawn.
While holding the wand, Orcus can use an action to conjure undead creatures whose combined average hit points don't exceed 500. These undead magically rise up from the ground or otherwise form in unoccupied spaces within 300 feet of Orcus and obey his commands until they are destroyed or until he dismisses them as an action. Once this property of the wand is used, the property can't be used again until the next dawn.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Orcus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Orcus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Orcus's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Master of Undeath
traits.desc: When Orcus casts animate dead or create undead, he chooses the level at which the spell is cast, and the creatures created by the spells remain under his control indefinitely. Additionally, he can cast create undead even when it isn't night.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Orcus makes two Wand of Orcus attacks.

actions.name: Wand of Orcus
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (2d12) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

legendary_actions.name: Tail
legendary_actions.desc: Orcus makes one tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: A Taste of Undeath
legendary_actions.desc: Orcus casts chill touch (17th level).

legendary_actions.name: Creeping Death (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Orcus chooses a point on the ground that he can see within 100 feet of him. A cylinder of swirling necrotic energy 60 feet tall and with a 10-foot radius rises from that point and lasts until the end of Orcus's next turn. Creatures in that area have vulnerability to necrotic damage.

spells: Orcus's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): create undead, dispel magic

monsters.name: Orthon
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.senses: darkvision 120 ft., truesight 30 ft., passive Perception 20

traits.name: Invisibility Field
traits.desc: The orthon can use a bonus action to become invisible. Any equipment the orthon wears or carries is also invisible as long as the equipment is on its person. This invisibility ends immediately after the orthon makes an attack roll or is hit by an attack.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The orthon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Infernal Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d4 + 6) slashing damage, and the target must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failure, the target is poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Brass Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage, plus one of the following effects:

actions.name: 1. Acid
actions.desc: The target must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking an additional 17 (5d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: 2. Blindness (1/Day)
actions.desc: The target takes 5 (1d10) radiant damage. In addition, the target and all other creatures within 20 feet of it must each make a successful 17 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of the orthon's next turn.

actions.name: 3. Concussion
actions.desc: The target and each creature within 20 feet of it must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 13 (2d12) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: 4. Entanglement
actions.desc: The target must make a successful 17 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained for 1 hour by strands of sticky webbing. A restrained creature can escape by using an action to make a successful 17 Dexterity or Strength check. Any creature other than an orthon that touches the restrained creature must make a successful 17 Dexterity saving throw or become similarly restrained.

actions.name: 5. Paralysis (1/Day)
actions.desc: The target takes 22 (4d10) lightning damage and must make a successful 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The paralyzed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 6. Tracking
actions.desc: For the next 24 hours, the orthon knows the direction and distance to the target, as long as it's on the same plane of existence. If the target is on a different plane, the orthon knows which one, but not the exact location there.

reactions.name: Explosive Retribution
reactions.desc: When it is reduced to 15 hit points or fewer, the orthon causes itself to explode. All other creatures within 30 feet of it must each make a 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) fire damage plus 9 (2d8) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This explosion destroys the orthon, its infernal dagger, and its brass crossbow.

monsters.name: Phoenix
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Fiery Death and Rebirth
traits.desc:
When the phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within 60-feet of it must make a 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't worn or carried.
The explosion destroys the phoenix's body and leaves behind an egg-shaped cinder that weighs 5 pounds. The cinder is blazing hot, dealing 21 (6d6) fire damage to any creature that touches it, though no more than once per round. The cinder is immune to all damage, and after 1d6 days, it hatches a new phoenix.

traits.name: Fire Form
traits.desc: The phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. Any creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. In addition, the phoenix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. With a touch, the phoenix can also ignite flammable objects that aren't worn or carried (no action required).

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The phoenix doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The phoenix sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the phoenix fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The phoenix deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The phoenix makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its fiery talons.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Fiery Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) fire damage.

legendary_actions.name: Peck
legendary_actions.desc: The phoenix makes one beak attack.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The phoenix moves up to its speed.

legendary_actions.name: Swoop (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The phoenix moves up to its speed and attacks with its fiery talons.

monsters.name: Red Abishai
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai can use its Frightful Presence. It also makes three attacks: one with its morningstar, one with its claw, and one with its bite.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 38 (7d10) fire damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the abishai's choice that is within 120 feet and aware of it must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the abishai's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Incite Fanaticism
actions.desc: The abishai chooses up to four of its allies within 60 feet of it that can see it. For 1 minute, each of those allies makes attack rolls with advantage and can't be frightened.

actions.name: Power of the Dragon Queen
actions.desc: The abishai targets one dragon it can see within 120 feet of it. The dragon must make a 18 Charisma saving throw. A chromatic dragon makes this save with disadvantage. On a successful save, the target is immune to the abishai's Power of the Dragon Queen for 1 hour. On a failed save, the target is charmed by the abishai for 1 hour. While charmed in this way, the target regards the abishai as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. This effect ends if the abishai or its companions deal damage to the target.

monsters.name: Retriever
monsters.damage_immunities: necrotic, poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15
monsters.languages: understands Abyssal, Elvish, and Undercommon but can't speak

traits.name: Faultless Tracker
traits.desc: The retriever is given a quarry by its master. The quarry can be a specific creature or object the master is personally acquainted with, or it can be a general type of creature or object the master has seen before. The retriever knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The retriever can have only one such quarry at a time. The retriever also always knows the location of its master.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The retriever makes two foreleg attacks and uses its force or paralyzing beam once, if available.

actions.name: Foreleg
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Force Beam
actions.desc: The retriever targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Paralyzing Beam (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
The retriever targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The paralyzed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
If the paralyzed creature is Medium or smaller, the retriever can pick it up as part of the retriever's move and walk or climb with it at full speed.

spells: The retriever's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 13). The retriever can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

traits.name: Rancid Degeneration
traits.desc: At the end of each of the troll's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 11 (2d10) necrotic damage, unless the troll has taken acid or fire damage since the end of its last turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Rutterkin
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

traits.name: Crippling Fear
traits.desc: When a creature that isn't a demon starts its turn within 30 feet of three or more rutterkins, it must make a 11 Wisdom saving throw. The creature has disadvantage on the save if it's within 30 feet of six or more rutterkins. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the Crippling Fear of all rutterkins for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, the creature is restrained. At the end of each of the frightened creature's turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage.
