If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned. At the end of each long rest, the poisoned target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points while poisoned in this way, it dies and instantly transforms into a living abyssal wretch|mtf. The transformation of the body can be undone only by a wish spell. (See notes)

monsters.name: Sacred Statue
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: the languages the eidolon knew in life

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

traits.name: Ghostly Inhabitant
traits.desc: The eidolon|MTF that enters the sacred statue remains inside it until the statue drops to 0 hit points, the eidolon uses a bonus action to move out of the statue, or the eidolon is turned or forced out by an effect such as the dispel evil and good spell. When the eidolon leaves the statue, it appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the statue.

traits.name: Inert
traits.desc: When not inhabited by an eidolon|MTF, the statue is an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The statue makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 43 (6d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 37 (6d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Sibriex
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Contamination
traits.desc: The sibriex emits an aura of corruption 30 feet in every direction. Plants that aren't creatures wither in the aura, and the ground in it is difficult terrain for other creatures. Any creature that starts its turn in the aura must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) poison damage. A creature that succeeds on the save is immune to this sibriex's Contamination for 24 hours.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the sibriex fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The sibriex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sibriex uses Squirt Bile once and makes three attacks using its chain, bite, or both.

actions.name: Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d12 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Squirt Bile
actions.desc: The sibriex targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 35 (10d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Warp Creature
actions.desc: The sibriex targets up to three creatures it can see within 120 feet of it. Each target must make a 20 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, a creature becomes immune to this sibriex's Warp Creature. On a failed save, the target is poisoned, which causes it to also gain 1 level of exhaustion. While poisoned in this way, the target must repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns. Three successful saves against the poison end it, and ending the poison removes any levels of exhaustion caused by it. Each failed save causes the target to suffer another level of exhaustion. Once the target reaches 6 levels of exhaustion, it dies and instantly transforms into a living abyssal wretch|mtf under the sibriex's control. The transformation of the body can be undone only by a wish spell.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex casts a spell.

legendary_actions.name: Spray Bile
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex uses Squirt Bile.

legendary_actions.name: Warp (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex uses Warp Creature.

spells: The sibriex's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 21). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: charm person, command, dispel magic, hold monster

monsters.name: Skull Lord
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, stunned, unconscious
monsters.languages: all the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the skull lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Master of the Grave
traits.desc: While within 30 feet of the skull lord, any undead ally of the skull lord makes saving throws with advantage, and that ally regains 1d6 hit points whenever it starts its turn there.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the skull lord is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half the damage, the skull lord instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skull lord makes three bone staff attacks.

actions.name: Bone Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage.

legendary_actions.name: Bone Staff (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The skull lord makes a bone staff attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.desc: The skull lord casts a cantrip.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The skull lord moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Summon Undead (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Up to five skeleton||skeletons or zombie||zombies appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the skull lord and remain until destroyed. Undead summoned in this way roll initiative and act in the next available turn. The skull lord can have up to five undead summoned by this ability at a time.

spells: The skull lord is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The skull lord knows the following sorcerer spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): chill touch, fire bolt, mage hand, poison spray, ray of frost, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): magic missile, expeditious retreat, thunderwave

monsters.name: Soul Monger

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The soul monger has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The soul monger has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Soul Thirst
traits.desc: When the soul monger reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the soul monger can gain temporary hit points equal to half the creature's hit point maximum. While the soul monger has temporary hit points from this ability, it has advantage on attack rolls.

traits.name: Weight of Ages
traits.desc: Any beast or humanoid, other than a shadar-kai, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the soul monger has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The soul monger makes two phantasmal dagger attacks.

actions.name: Phantasmal Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (4d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on saving throws until the start of the soul monger's next turn.

actions.name: Wave of Weariness (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The soul monger emits weariness in a 60-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (10d8) psychic damage and suffers 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, it takes 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

spells: The soul monger's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (1e): bestow curse, chain lightning, finger of death, gaseous form, phantasmal killer, seeming

monsters.name: Spirit Troll
monsters.damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The troll can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes psychic or force damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 19 (3d10 + 3) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 14 (2d10 + 3) psychic damage.

monsters.name: Spring Eladrin
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Joyful Presence
traits.desc:
Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Joyful Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks. The eladrin can cast one spell in place of one of these attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.

spells: The eladrin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): confusion, enthrall, suggestion

traits.name: Aura of Madness
traits.desc: Creatures within 20 feet of the grue that aren't aberrations have disadvantage on saving throws, as well as on attack rolls against creatures other than a star spawn grue.

actions.name: Confounding Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 10 Wisdom saving throw or attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of the grue's next turn.

monsters.name: Star Spawn Hulk
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Psychic Mirror
traits.desc: If the hulk takes psychic damage, each creature within 10 feet of the hulk takes that damage instead; the hulk takes none of the damage. In addition, the hulk's thoughts and location can't be discerned by magic.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hulk makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the target also takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage and must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Reaping Arms (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The hulk makes a separate slam attack against each creature within 10 feet of it. Each creature that is hit must also succeed on a 17 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Star Spawn Larva Mage
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained

traits.name: Return to Worms
traits.desc: When the larva mage is reduced to 0 hit points, it breaks apart into a swarm of insects in the same space. Unless the swarm is destroyed, the larva mage reforms from it 24 hours later.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Plague of Worms (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Each creature other than a star spawn within 10 feet of the larva mage must make a 19 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure the target takes 22 (5d8) necrotic damage and is blinded and restrained by masses of swarming worms. The affected creature takes 22 (5d8) necrotic damage at the start of each of the larva mage's turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reactions.name: Feed on Weakness
reactions.desc: When a creature within 20 feet of the larva mage fails a saving throw, the larva mage gains 10 temporary hit points.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The larva mage casts one cantrip.

legendary_actions.name: Slam (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The larva mage makes one slam attack.

legendary_actions.name: Feed (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature restrained by the larva mage's Plague of Worms takes 13 (3d8) necrotic damage, and the larva mage gains 6 temporary hit points.

spells: The larva mage's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Star Spawn Mangler
monsters.damage_resistances: cold

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.desc: On the first round of each combat, the mangler has advantage on attack rolls against a creature that hasn't taken a turn yet.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the mangler can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mangler makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the attack roll has advantage, the target also takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Flurry of Claws (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The mangler makes six claw attacks against one target. Either before or after these attacks, it can move up to its speed as a bonus action without provoking opportunity attacks.

monsters.name: Star Spawn Seer
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Out-of-Phase Movement
traits.desc: The seer can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. Each creature it moves through takes 5 (1d10) psychic damage; no creature can take this damage more than once per turn. The seer takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The seer makes two comet staff attacks or uses Psychic Orb twice.

actions.name: Comet Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, or 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, if used with two hands, and the target must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Psychic Orb
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +11 to hit, range 120 feet, one target. 27 (5d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Collapse Distance (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The seer warps space around a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. That creature must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, is magically teleported up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space the seer can see, and all other creatures within 10 feet of the target's original space each takes 39 (6d12) psychic damage. On a successful save, the target takes 19 (3d12) psychic damage.

reactions.name: Bend Space
reactions.desc: When the seer would be hit by an attack, it teleports, exchanging positions with another star spawn it can see within 60 feet of it. The other star spawn is hit by the attack instead.

monsters.name: Steel Predator
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, lightning, necrotic, thunder
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 17
monsters.languages: understands Modron and the language of its owner but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The steel predator has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The steel predator's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The steel predator makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claw.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d6 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d8 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Stunning Roar (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The steel predator emits a roar in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (5d10) thunder damage, drops everything it's holding, and is stunned for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The steel predator's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. The steel predator can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monsters.name: Stone Cursed
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Cunning Opportunist
traits.desc: The stone cursed has advantage on the attack rolls of opportunity attacks.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the stone cursed remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

actions.name: Petrifying Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage, or 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage if the attack roll had advantage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw, or it begins to turn to stone and is restrained until the end of its next turn, when it must repeat the saving throw. The effect ends if the second save is successful; otherwise the target is petrified for 24 hours.

monsters.name: Stone Defender
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the stone defender remains motionless against an uneven earthen or stone surface, it is indistinguishable from that surface.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The stone defender has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is knocked prone.

reactions.name: Intercept Attack
reactions.desc: In response to another creature within 5 feet of it being hit by an attack roll, the stone defender gives that creature a +5 bonus to its AC against that attack, potentially causing a miss. To use this ability, the stone defender must be able to see the creature and the attacker.

monsters.name: Summer Eladrin
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Fearsome Presence
traits.desc: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The eladrin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the eladrin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Sword Wraith Commander
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Martial Fury
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the sword wraith can make one weapon attack, which deals an extra 9 (2d8) necrotic damage on a hit. If it does so, attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Turning Defiance
traits.desc: The sword wraith and any other sword wraiths within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sword wraith makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Call to Honor (1/Day)
actions.desc: To use this action, the sword wraith must have taken damage during the current combat. If the sword wraith can use this action, it gives itself advantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn, and 1d4 + 1 sword wraith warrior|mtf|sword wraith warriors appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of it. The warriors last until they drop to 0 hit points, and they take their turns immediately after the commander's turn on the same initiative count.

monsters.name: Sword Wraith Warrior
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Martial Fury
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the sword wraith can make one weapon attack. If it does so, attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: The Angry
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Two Heads
traits.desc: The Angry has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Rising Anger
traits.desc:
If another creature deals damage to the Angry, the Angry's attack rolls have advantage until the end of its next turn, and the first time it hits with a hook attack on its next turn, the attack's target takes an extra 19 (3d12) psychic damage.
On its turn, the Angry has disadvantage on attack rolls if no other creature has dealt damage to it since the end of its last turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Angry makes two hook attacks.

actions.name: Hook
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: The Hungry
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Life Hunger
traits.desc: If a creature the Hungry can see regains hit points, the Hungry gains two benefits until the end of its next turn: it has advantage on attack rolls, and its bite deals an extra 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a hit.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Hungry makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape 16) and is restrained until the grapple ends. While grappling a creature, the Hungry can't attack with its claws.

monsters.name: The Lonely
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Psychic Leech
traits.desc: At the start of each of the Lonely's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

traits.name: Thrives on Company
traits.desc: The Lonely has advantage on attack rolls while it is within 30 feet of at least two other creatures. It otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Lonely makes one harpoon arm attack and uses Sorrowful Embrace.

actions.name: Harpoon Arm
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature.
The Lonely has two harpoon arms and can grapple up to two creatures at once.

actions.name: Sorrowful Embrace
actions.desc: Each creature grappled by the Lonely must make a 15 Wisdom saving throw. A creature takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In either case, the Lonely pulls each creature grappled by it up to 30 feet straight toward it.

monsters.name: The Lost
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing while in dim light or darkness

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Lost makes two arm spike attacks.

actions.name: Arm Spike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Embrace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 25 (4d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 14) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is frightened, and it takes 27 (6d8) psychic damage at the end of each of its turns. The Lost can embrace only one creature at a time.

reactions.name: Tightening Embrace
reactions.desc: If the Lost takes damage while it has a creature grappled, that creature takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage.

monsters.name: The Wretched
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Wretched Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The Wretched has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Wretched's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated. The Wretched otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage, and the Wretched attaches to the target. While attached, the Wretched can't attack, and at the start of each of the Wretched's turns, the target takes 6 (1d10 + 1) necrotic damage.
The attached Wretched moves with the target whenever the target moves, requiring none of the Wretched's movement. The Wretched can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement on its turn. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach a Wretched.

monsters.name: Titivilus
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Titivilus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Titivilus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Titivilus's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Titivilus regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Titivilus dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Ventriloquism
traits.desc: Whenever Titivilus speaks, he can choose a point within 60 feet; his voice emanates from that point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Titivilus makes one sword attack and uses his Frightful Word once.

actions.name: Silver Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage if used with two hands. If the target is a creature, its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to half the necrotic damage it takes.

actions.name: Frightful Word
actions.desc: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, the target must take the Dash action and move away from Titivilus by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash action. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Titivilus magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

actions.name: Twisting Words
actions.desc: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a 21 Charisma saving throw. On a failure the target is charmed for 1 minute. The charmed target can repeat the saving throw if Titivilus deals any damage to it. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to Titivilus's Twisting Words for 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Assault (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Titivilus attacks with his silver sword or uses his Frightful Word.

legendary_actions.name: Corrupting Guidance
legendary_actions.desc: Titivilus uses Twisting Words. Alternatively, he targets one creature charmed by him that is within 60 feet of him; that charmed target must make a 21 Charisma saving throw. On a failure, Titivilus decides how the target acts during its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Titivilus uses his Teleport action.

spells: Titivilus's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 21). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self, animate dead, bestow curse, confusion, major image, modify memory, nondetection, sending, suggestion

spells.Daily (3e): greater invisibility (self only), mislead

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.desc: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

monsters.name: Tortle Druid

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.desc: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

spells: The tortle is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, guidance, produce flame

spells.1st level (4 slots): animal friendship, cure wounds, speak with animals, thunderwave

monsters.name: Vampiric Mist
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, lightning, necrotic, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Life Sense
traits.desc: The mist can sense the location of any creature within 60 feet of it, unless that creature's type is construct or undead.

traits.name: Forbiddance
traits.desc: The mist can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

traits.name: Misty Form
traits.desc: The mist can occupy another creature's space and vice versa. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can pass through it without squeezing. Each foot of movement in water costs it 2 extra feet, rather than 1 extra foot. The mist can't manipulate objects in any way that requires fingers or manual dexterity.

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
traits.desc: The mist takes 10 radiant damage whenever it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, the mist has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: The mist touches one creature in its space. The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw (undead and constructs automatically succeed), or it takes 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage, the mist regains 10 hit points, and the target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Poison Splash
traits.desc: When the troll takes damage of any type but psychic, each creature within 5 feet of the troll takes 9 (2d8) poison damage.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage, and the creature is poisoned until the start of the troll's next turn.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Venom Spray (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The troll slices itself with a claw, releasing a spray of poison in a 15-foot cube. The troll takes 7 (2d6) slashing damage (this damage can't be reduced in any way). Each creature in the area must make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Wastrilith
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The wastrilith can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Corrupt Water
traits.desc:
At the start of each of the wastrilith's turns, exposed water within 30 feet of it is befouled. Underwater, this effect lightly obscures the area until a current clears it away. Water in containers remains corrupted until it evaporates.
A creature that consumes this foul water or swims in it must make a 18 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the foul water for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. At the end of this time, the poisoned creature must repeat the saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 18 (4d8) poison damage and is poisoned until it finishes a long rest.
If another demon drinks the foul water as an action, it gains 11 (2d10) temporary hit points.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The wastrilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Undertow
traits.desc: As a bonus action when the wastrilith is underwater, it can cause all water within 60 feet of it to be difficult terrain for other creatures until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The wastrilith uses Grasping Spout and makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 30 (4d12 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Grasping Spout
actions.desc: The wastrilith magically launches a spout of water at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a 17 Strength saving throw, and it has disadvantage if it's underwater. On a failed save, it takes 22 (4d8 + 4) acid damage and is pulled up to 60 feet toward the wastrilith. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.

monsters.name: Water Elemental Myrmidon
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: Aquan, one language of its creator's choice

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The myrmidon makes three trident attacks.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Freezing Strikes (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) cold damage. A target that is hit by one or more of these attacks has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

monsters.name: White Abishai
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the abishai can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its claw.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

reactions.name: Vicious Reprisal
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, the abishai makes a bite attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the abishai moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking opportunity attacks.

monsters.name: Winter Eladrin
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sorrowful Presence
traits.desc:
Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Sorrowful Presence for the next 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) slashing damage, or 5 (1d10) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Frigid Rebuke
reactions.desc: When the eladrin takes damage from a creature the eladrin can see within 60 feet of it, the eladrin can force that creature to succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) cold damage.

spells: The eladrin's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Yagnoloth
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yagnoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The yagnoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The yagnoloth makes one massive arm attack and one electrified touch attack, or it makes one massive arm attack and teleports before or after the attack.

actions.name: Electrified Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 27 (6d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Massive Arm
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 23 (3d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw or is stunned until the end of the yagnoloth's next turn.

actions.name: Life Leech
actions.desc: The yagnoloth touches one incapacitated creature within 15 feet of it. The target takes 36 (7d8 + 4) necrotic damage, and the yagnoloth gains temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt. The target must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw, or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest, and the target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Battlefield Cunning (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: Up to two allied yugoloths within 60 feet of the yagnoloth that can hear it can use their reactions to make one melee attack each.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The yagnoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The yagnoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), suggestion

monsters.name: Yeenoghu
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Yeenoghu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Yeenoghu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Yeenoghu's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.desc: When Yeenoghu reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on his turn, Yeenoghu can take a bonus action to move up to half his speed and make a bite attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc:
Yeenoghu makes three flail attacks. If an attack hits, he can cause it to create an additional effect of his choice or at random (each effect can be used only once per Multiattack):
1. The attack deals an extra 13 (2d12) bludgeoning damage.
2. The target must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the start of Yeenoghu's next turn.
3. The target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or be affected by the confusion spell until the start of Yeenoghu's next turn.

actions.name: Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 15 (1d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (1d10 + 9) piercing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Charge
legendary_actions.desc: Yeenoghu moves up to his speed.

legendary_actions.name: Swat Away
legendary_actions.desc: Yeenoghu makes a flail attack. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a 24 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet in a straight line away from Yeenoghu. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls prone.

legendary_actions.name: Savage (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Yeenoghu makes a bite attack against each creature within 10 feet of him.

spells: Yeenoghu's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): dispel magic, fear, invisibility

monsters.name: Young Kruthik
monsters.senses: darkvision 30 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The kruthik has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 2½-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Stab
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Zaratan
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 15

traits.name: Earth-Shaking Movement
traits.desc:
As a bonus action after moving at least 10 feet on the ground, the zaratan can send a shock wave through the ground in a 120-foot-radius circle centered on itself. That area becomes difficult terrain for 1 minute. Each creature on the ground that is concentrating must succeed on a 25 Constitution saving throw or the creature's concentration is broken.
The shock wave deals 100 thunder damage to all structures in contact with the ground in the area. If a creature is near a structure that collapses, the creature might be buried; a creature within half the distance of the structure's height must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 17 (5d6) bludgeoning damage, is knocked prone, and is trapped in the rubble. A trapped creature is restrained, requiring a successful 20 Strength (Athletics) check as an action to escape. Another creature within 5 feet of the buried creature can use its action to clear rubble and grant advantage on the check. If three creatures use their actions in this way, the check is an automatic success. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall prone or become trapped.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the zaratan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The zaratan's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Earth-Shaking Movement).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The zaratan makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stomp.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 28 (4d8 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 26 (3d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spit Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +17 to hit, range 120/240 ft., one target. 31 (6d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spew Debris (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The zaratan exhales rocky debris in a 90-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is knocked prone.

legendary_actions.name: Stomp
legendary_actions.desc: The zaratan makes one stomp attack.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The zaratan moves up to its speed.

legendary_actions.name: Spit (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The zaratan uses Spit Rock.

legendary_actions.name: Retract (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The zaratan retracts into its shell. Until it takes its Emerge action, it has resistance to all damage, and it is restrained. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Revitalize or Emerge action.

legendary_actions.name: Revitalize (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The zaratan can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell. It regains 52 (5d20) hit points. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Emerge action.

legendary_actions.name: Emerge (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The zaratan emerges from its shell and uses Spit Rock. It can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell.

monsters.name: Zariel
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, radiant, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede Zariel's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Zariel's weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 36 (8d8) fire damage (included in the weapon attacks below).

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Zariel fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Zariel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Zariel regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn. If she takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Zariel dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Zariel attacks twice with her longsword or with her javelins. She can substitute Horrid Touch for one of these attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage plus 36 (8d8) fire damage, or 19 (2d10 + 8) slashing damage plus 36 (8d8) fire damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) piercing damage plus 36 (8d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Horrid Touch (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Zariel touches one creature within 10 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 26 Constitution saving throw or take 44 (8d10) necrotic damage and be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is also blinded and deafened. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Zariel magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

legendary_actions.name: Immolating Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Zariel turns her magical gaze toward one creature she can see within 120 feet of her and commands it to combust. The target must succeed on a 26 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (4d10) fire damage.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Zariel uses her Teleport action.

spells: Zariel's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 26). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing her appearance), detect evil and good, fireball, invisibility (self only), wall of fire

spells.Daily (3e): blade barrier, dispel evil and good, finger of death

monsters.name: Zuggtmoy
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Zuggtmoy fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Zuggtmoy has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Zuggtmoy's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Zuggtmoy makes three pseudopod attacks.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Infestation Spores (3/Day)
actions.desc: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, must make a 19 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

actions.name: Mind Control Spores (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers for 1 minute. Humanoids and beasts in the cloud when it appears, or that enter it later, must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the influence of Zuggtmoy for 24 hours. While infected in this way, the creature is charmed by her and can't be reinfected by these spores.

reactions.name: Protective Thrall
reactions.desc: When Zuggtmoy is hit by an attack, one creature within 5 feet of Zuggtmoy that is charmed by her must use its reaction to be hit by the attack instead.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Zuggtmoy makes one pseudopod attack.

legendary_actions.name: Exert Will
legendary_actions.desc: One creature charmed by Zuggtmoy that she can see must use its reaction to move up to its speed as she directs or to make a weapon attack against a target that she designates.

spells: Zuggtmoy's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 22). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: detect magic, locate animals or plants, ray of sickness

spells.Daily (3e): dispel magic, ensnaring strike, entangle, plant growth

monsters.name: Animated Object (Huge)
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: Animated
traits.desc:
If the object lacks legs or other appendages it can use for locomotion, it instead has a flying speed of 30 feet and can hover. If the object is securely attached to a surface or larger object, such as a chain bolted to a wall, its speed is 0.
When the animated object drops to 0 hit points, it reverts to its original object form, and any remaining damage carries over to its original object form.
The DM might rule that a specific objects slam attack inflicts slashing or piercing damage based on its form.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Aberrant Spirit
monsters.languages: Deep Speech, understands the languages you speak

traits.name: Regeneration (Slaad Only)
traits.desc: The aberration regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

traits.name: Whispering Aura (Star Spawn Only)
traits.desc: At the start of each of the aberration's turns, each creature within 5 feet of the aberration must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or take 2d6 psychic damage, provided that the aberration isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aberration makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Eye Ray (Beholderkin Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one creature. 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel psychic damage.

actions.name: Claws (Slaad Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the aberration's next turn.

actions.name: Psychic Slam (Star Spawn Only)
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel psychic damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the beast moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a maul attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Primal Bond
traits.desc: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d8 + 2 + PB slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The beast can breathe both air and water.

traits.name: Primal Bond
traits.desc: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.name: Binding Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 2 + PB piercing damage or 1d6 + 2 + PB bludgeoning damage (your choice), and the target is grappled (escape DC equal to your spellcasting save DC). Until this grapple ends, the beast can't use this attack on another target.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Primal Bond
traits.desc: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.name: Shred
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d4 + 3 + PB slashing damage

monsters.name: Bestial Spirit
monsters.speed: 30 ft., climb 30 ft. (land only), fly 60 ft. (air only), swim 30 ft. (water only)

traits.name: Water Breathing (Water Only)
traits.desc: The beast can breathe only underwater.

traits.name: Flyby (Air Only)
traits.desc: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Pack Tactics (Land and Water Only)
traits.desc: The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel piercing damage.

monsters.name: Celestial Spirit
monsters.damage_resistances: radiant
monsters.languages: Celestial, understands the languages you speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The celestial makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Radiant Bow (Avenger Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 2d6 + 2 + summonSpellLevel radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Mace (Defender Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel radiant damage, and the celestial can choose itself or another creature it can see within 10 feet of the target. The chosen creature gains 1d10 temporary hit points.

actions.name: Healing Touch (1/Day)
actions.desc: The celestial touches another creature. The target magically regains hit points equal to 2d8 + summonSpellLevel.

monsters.name: Construct Spirit
monsters.damage_resistances: poison
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Heated Body (Metal Only)
traits.desc: A creature that touches the construct or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 1d10 fire damage.

traits.name: Stony Lethargy (Stone Only)
traits.desc: When a creature the construct can see starts its turn within 10 feet of the construct, the construct can force it to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, the target can't use reactions and its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The construct makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Berserk Lashing (Clay Only)
reactions.desc: When the construct takes damage, it makes a slam attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the construct moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The item is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Irrepressible Dance
traits.desc: When any creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the item, the item can increase or decrease (your choice) the walking speed of that creature by 10 feet until the end of the turn, provided the item isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Force-Empowered Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. 1d10 + PB force damage.

monsters.name: Elemental Spirit
monsters.speed: 40 ft., burrow 40 ft. (earth only), fly 40 ft. (air only hover), swim 40 ft. (water only)
monsters.damage_resistances: lightning, thunder (Air only), piercing, slashing (Earth only), acid (Water only)
monsters.languages: Primordial, understands the languages you speak

traits.name: Amorphous Form (Air, Fire, and Water Only)
traits.desc: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elemental makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d10 + 4 + summonSpellLevel bludgeoning damage (Air, Earth, and Water only) or fire damage (Fire only).

monsters.name: Fey Spirit
monsters.languages: Sylvan, understands the languages you speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel piercing damage + 1d6 force damage.

bonus_actions.name: Fey Step
bonus_actions.desc: The fey magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Then one of the following effects occurs, based on the fey's chosen mood:

bonus_actions.name: Fuming
bonus_actions.desc: The fey has advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

bonus_actions.name: Mirthful
bonus_actions.desc: The fey can force one creature it can see within 10 feet of it to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. Unless the save succeeds, the target is charmed by you and the fey for 1 minute or until the target takes any damage.

bonus_actions.name: Tricksy
bonus_actions.desc: The fey can fill a 5-foot cube within 5 feet of it with magical darkness, which lasts until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Fiendish Spirit
monsters.speed: 40 ft., climb 40 ft. (demon only), fly 60 ft. (devil only)
monsters.damage_resistances: fire

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Death Throes (Demon Only)
traits.desc: When the fiend drops to 0 hit points or the spell ends, the fiend explodes, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC. A creature takes 2d10 + summonSpellLevel fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Devil's Sight (Devil Only)
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fiend's darkvision.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fiend makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Bite (Demon Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws (Yugoloth Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel slashing damage. Immediately after the attack hits or misses, the fiend can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Hurl Flame (Devil Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. 2d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the homunculus is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

actions.name: Force Strike
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 30 ft., one target you can see. 1d4 + PB force damage.

reactions.name: Channel Magic
reactions.desc: The homunculus delivers a spell you cast that has a range of touch. The homunculus must be within 120 feet of you.

traits.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
traits.desc: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The mimic can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

actions.name: Shape-Shift
actions.desc: The mimic polymorphs into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

monsters.name: Mighty Servant of Leuk-o
monsters.damage_immunities: acid, bludgeoning, cold, fire, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant
monsters.damage_resistances: piercing, slashing
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained, stunned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of creatures attuned to it but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Existence
traits.desc: The servant is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form or send it to another plane of existence.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The servant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and spell attacks made against it have disadvantage.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The servant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If it is reduced to 0 hit points, this trait doesn't function until an attuned creature spends 24 hours repairing the artifact or until the artifact is subjected to lightning damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The servant's long jump is up to 50 feet and its high jump is up to 25 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The servant doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Destructive Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage. If the target is an object, it takes triple damage.

actions.name: Crushing Leap
actions.desc: If the servant jumps at least 25 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures is pushed to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the servant and must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 26 (4d12) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

monsters.name: Shadow Spirit
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic

traits.name: Terror Frenzy (Fury Only)
traits.desc: The spirit has advantage on attack rolls against frightened creatures.

traits.name: Weight of Sorrow (Despair Only)
traits.desc: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Chilling Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel cold damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Scream (1/Day)
actions.desc: The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Shadow Stealth (Fear Only)
bonus_actions.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the spirit takes the Hide action.

traits.name: Vigilant
traits.desc: The defender can't be surprised.

actions.name: Force-Empowered Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. 1d8 + PB force damage.

actions.name: Repair (3/Day)
actions.desc: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore 2d8 + PB hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

reactions.name: Deflect Attack
reactions.desc: The defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.

traits.name: Incorporeal Passage (Ghostly Only)
traits.desc: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 1d10 force damage for every 5 feet traveled.

traits.name: Festering Aura (Putrid Only)
traits.desc: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be poisoned until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Deathly Touch (Ghostly Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened of the undead until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Grave Bolt (Skeletal Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. 2d4 + 3 + summonSpellLevel necrotic damage.

actions.name: Rotting Claw (Putrid Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel slashing damage. If the target is poisoned, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Flame Seed
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 60 ft., one target you can see. 1d6 + PB fire damage.

actions.name: Fiery Teleportation
actions.desc: The spirit and each willing creature of your choice within 5 feet of it teleport up to 15 feet to unoccupied spaces you can see. Then each creature within 5 feet of the space that the spirit left must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC or take 1d6 + PB fire damage.

monsters.name: Abjurer

traits.name: Arcane Ward
traits.desc: The abjurer has a magical ward that has 30 hit points. Whenever the abjurer takes damage, the ward takes the damage instead. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, the abjurer takes any remaining damage. When the abjurer casts an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, the ward regains a number of hit points equal to twice the level of the spell.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: The abjurer is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The abjurer has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): blade ward, dancing lights, mending, message, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): alarm*, mage armor*, magic missile, shield*

spells.5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, wall of force

spells.6th level (1 slots): flesh to stone, globe of invulnerability*

monsters.name: Alhoon
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, lightning, necrotic

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Chilling Grasp
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The alhoon magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
